name: Our Future
description:
This game is made for - 21T3 CIM211 Project 3 : Transhumanism

What is this game about?

Our Future is a Base Defense Game set in a futuristic Earth where self-aware Artificial Intelligence robots started to turn against humanity. The player, as the commander, must research transhuman technologies to augment regular human troops to beat them.

The game focuses on how transhumanism can help humans to beat hostile robots/AI, which wouldn't be possible without transhumanism.

How to play?

Click on Human Troops to send them out to the field to protect your base against the hostile Self-Aware AIs.

Click on Transhumanism Research when they are ready --> Augment your Human Troops.

Keep augmenting your Human Troops and they will eventually become strong enough to beat the AIs.
